column1: le. roy henkel| le. roy john henkel died on saturday
column3: 2015 at essentia health care center in sandstone. he was 86 years old. funeral services will be held at 11:00 a. m. on wednesday
column5: 2015 at immanuel lutheran church in giese
column6: mn with pastors roy lovaas and richard langhorst officiating. visitation will be on tuesday
column8: 2015 from 5 until 7 p. m. at methven funeral home in sandstone
column9: as well as one hour prior to the service at the church. burial will be at immanuel lutheran cemetery in giese. arrangements by methven funeral home.
